name: Egg Commando
description:
A spaceship from the egg world has crashed into an alien planet. Sole Survivor: alien warrior the only egg that can handle 6 weapons at once. alien warrior must survive this harsh environment, waiting for the rescue of his companions.

automatic fire weapon

Fast running

Many features are available to customize your run (you decide if it's stupid, one-handed or crazy?)

Tons of items and weapons to choose from (flame throwers, SMGs, rocket launchers or sticks and stones)

Survive each wave lasting between 20 and 90 seconds, killing as many aliens as possible during this time

Gather materials to gain experience and get items from the store in waves of enemies.
